# Summarize This {#summarize-this}

#### Keywords {-}

summarize, abstract, save time


## The Challenge
Today, with our busy lives, it is becoming more and more difficult to find the time to read.


## How to Solve
The idea is to build a tool that can extract important words and sentences out of a lengthy article and summarize it in few paragraphs. 


## The Difference
This will be a huge time saver for all online readers.
